Title: Honour to married couples with only one child! - It's good to have an only child!
Publisher: Sub-center of education and publicity on family planning Chengdu China (中国成都计划生育宣传教育分中心)
Notes: "Honour to married couples with only one child!" is the English text in the image, "It's good to have an only child!" is the translation of the title in Chinese.
